front.title: Ethernet Tag ID Usage Update for Ethernet A-D per EVI Route

abstract.t: This draft discusses the issues with ESI Overlay Index. Then it proposes an extension to [RFC7432] and [I-D.sajassi-bess-evpn-ip-aliasing] to do ARP synchronizing and IP aliasing for Layer 3 routes that is needed for L3-EVIs to build a complete IP ECMP. It also extended two EVPN Service Interfaces for EVPN VPLS services.
